text: Benjamin Hadley (1871–1937) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for West Bromwich Albion. ==References== Category:1871 births Category:1937 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:English Football League players Category:Hereford Thistle F.C. players Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players
title: Ben Hadley
